title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.8 - Lost and found
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.8 - Lost and found

State Regulations

Any person finding lost articles at any terminal shall turn
same over to the office of the manager thereof. Articles unclaimed by the owner
shall be disposed of in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Property

Law in such cases made and provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1150.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
